sourcesContent:
<template>
<n-card title={{userInfo.username}}>

</n-card>
<n-card title="营销活动" v-if="userInfo.created_campaigns">
 {{userInfo.created_campaigns}}
({userInfo.username}}
</n-card>

<n-calendar
    v-model:value="value"
    #="{ year, month, date }"
    :is-date-disabled="isDateDisabled"
    @update:value="handleUpdateValue"
  >
    {{ year }}-{{ month }}-{{ date }}
  </n-calendar>

</template>

<script setup>
import { isYesterday, addDays } from 'date-fns/esm';
import {NCalendar,NCard} from 'naive-ui';
import {ref} from 'vue';
import axios from 'axios';

import {onBeforeMount} from 'vue';
const userName = ref('');
const userInfo = ref({
    username:'',
    });
//const message = useMessage();
const value = ref(addDays(Date.now(), 1).valueOf());
const handleUpdateValue = (_, { year, month, date }) => {  
  console.log(`${year}-${month}-${date}`);
};

const isDateDisabled = (timestamp) => {
    if (isYesterday(timestamp)) {
          return true
        }
    return false
    };

const fetchUserInfo = async() => {
      const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
      console.log(token);
      try {
        const resp =  await axios.get('/account/auth/',{
            headers: {
                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` // 设置请求头
                }});
        console.log('验证结果:')
        console.log(resp.data);
        userInfo.value = resp.data;
        userName.value = resp.data.username;
        //has_brands.value = resp.data.created_brands.length;
        localStorage.setItem('username',resp.data.username);
          } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch user info:', error);
      }
    };

onBeforeMount(()=>{
    fetchUserInfo();})

</script>
